edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc.lucene
Class LuceneConstants

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc.lucene.LuceneConstants
public class LuceneConstants
extends java.lang.Object

A "constants container" for the package. Many of these are used for constructing the meta-attributes of a Lucene-wrapped collection, and indicate the current capabilities and limitations of the Lucene engine, particularly in terms of fields supported, modifiers supported, and supported combinations of the two. Should Lucene's capabilities ever change, this file may need to be edited. Keeping them here minimizes the impact of change.

Right now, the limitations are as follows:

  • All STARTS fields can be supported
  • Only the lt, gt, eq, ne modifiers are supported
  • Modifiers can only be used with the DATE_LAST_MODIFIED field.
See the design document for more information on what Lucene can and cannot do.
